If you have a designation that requires the registration mark, you can copy and paste it into the field.

sub_fields.label: Header Default Text
sub_fields.name: share_link_header_default_text_personalizations_share_link
sub_fields.default_value:
Your advisor has sent you this resource to learn a little more about your situation. It should only take a few moments to complete. Please do not include sensitive information (SSN or account numbers) in your responses.

If you dont know the answer to a question, please leave the boxes unchecked and move on to the next question.

This link will remain active for 5 days.
